import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-product', templateUrl: './add-product.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-product.component.css'] }) export class AddProductComponent implements OnInit{ productform!:FormGroup; ngOnInit(): void { /* pro:Product={ id:1,name:"",address:"",image:this.imageUrl+"residence1.jpg" }*/ this.productform=new FormGroup({ id:new FormControl(''), title:new FormControl(), price:new FormControl(), }) } add(){ console.log(console.log("notre form"+JSON.stringify(this.productform.value))) } }
